name: Ys VI: The Ark of Napishtim

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Ys VI - The Ark of Napishtim/ys6_win.exe

files.game: N/A:Select the Ys VI installer provided by GOG.

task.description: Running config tool for first time launch...
task.executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Ys VI - The Ark of Napishtim/config.exe
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- lavf: https://github.com/Nevcairiel/LAVFilters/releases/download/0.74.1/LAVFilters-0.74.1-Installer.exe
- game: N/A:Select the Ys VI installer provided by GOG.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Ys VI - The Ark of Napishtim/ys6_win.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: quartz
    arch: win32
    description: Installing quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: amstream
    arch: win32
    description: Installing amstream
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Install LavFilter to have movies
    executable: lavf
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Running config tool for first time launch...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Ys VI - The Ark of Napishtim/config.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  overrides:
    winegstreamer: disabled
